Question
========

Given two independent stochastic variables x ( with mean 30 and sd 4) and y (with mean 50 and sd 6). z = 2x - y. Mean and standard deviation of z are then respectively.

Answerlist
----------

* 10 and 2
* 110 and 14
* 10 and 14
* 10 and 10

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 10 and 2: Incorrect
* 110 and 14: Incorrect
* 10 and 14: Incorrect
* 10 and 10: Correct
